hero.name: Juan Carlos
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer creating innovative solutions with modern technologies

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Developer & Problem Solver
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer specialized in JavaScript, TypeScript and Python, with a particular focus on creating accessible and usable interfaces. I have experience developing modern web applications with React, Express.js and relational databases.
about.journey: My passion for software development centers on implementing clean architecture and clean code. I constantly seek to learn new technologies like Artificial Intelligence, DevOps and Cybersecurity, while automating tasks with Bash and Python scripts.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills in various technologies and frameworks.

vetCareFrontend.title: Vet-Care Frontend
vetCareFrontend.description: Developed the user interface for veterinary appointment management, including dashboards for users and veterinarians, using React and Tailwind CSS.

vetCareBackend.title: Vet-Care Backend
vetCareBackend.description: Implemented RESTful API for business logic and data management with MySQL, plus implementation with Node.js, Express, Sequelize and JWT security.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Developed my web portfolio created primarily to showcase my work, deployed on Netlify, built with a predefined color palette and minimalist design using React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS.

api-auth.title: Authentication API
api-auth.description: A simple login and registration API built with Express.js in JavaScript, using PostgreSQL as the database, JWT for authentication, middleware for request validation, and additional supporting features.

dragonBall.title: Dragon Ball API
dragonBall.description: A web application that displays information about Dragon Ball characters using an external API. Built with React, JavaScript and Tailwind CSS, featuring a responsive design and interactive user interface.

cafeYamara.title: Caf√© Yamara
cafeYamara.description: Web application for coffee shop menu and order management. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering, Tailwind CSS for styling, Supabase as database, and Zustand for global state management.

stack.title: My Tech Stack
stack.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use to bring ideas to life. Always learning and adapting to new technologies.
stack.learningDescription: The tech world evolves rapidly, and I'm committed to staying updated with the latest trends, best practices, and emerging technologies. I regularly explore new frameworks, attend tech conferences, and contribute to open-source projects to enhance my skills and give back to the community.

certificates.title: Certifications & Achievements
certificates.subtitle: My continuous learning journey backed by certifications from the best platforms.

microsoftAzure.title: Azure Fundamentals
microsoftAzure.description: Microsoft Azure cloud fundamentals, core services and architecture.

googleCloud.title: Google Cloud Digital Leader
googleCloud.description: Digital leadership in Google cloud, digital transformation and cloud strategy.

awsCloudPractitioner.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
awsCloudPractitioner.description: Fundamental concepts of Amazon Web Services and cloud best practices.

ibmDataScience.title: IBM Data Science Professional
ibmDataScience.description: Professional data science with Python, machine learning and statistical analysis.

platziJavaScript.title: Git & GitHub
platziJavaScript.description: Master version control with Git and collaborative development using GitHub, including branching strategies, pull requests, code reviews, and team workflows for professional software development.

minticProgramming.title: Basic Programming Bootcamp
minticProgramming.description: Comprehensive bootcamp covering programming fundamentals with JavaScript and Python, web development with HTML and CSS, and building real-world projects.

ibmCybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
ibmCybersecurity.description: Foundational understanding of cybersecurity concepts including threat groups, attack types, cryptography, and organizational security strategies.

awsDevOps.title: DevOps on AWS and Project Management
awsDevOps.description: Learn about project management use cases in business, understanding the differences between Agile and Waterfall methodologies, and implementing DevOps practices on AWS.

footer.description: Creating innovative digital solutions with passion and precision. Let's build something amazing together.
footer.availability: Available for freelance work and collaboration opportunities.
